Articles.Content:
Hey all, I'm Morgan and I've been playing the game for over a year but just now got on the forums. 

I'm currently working on a huge [WWII project](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/124716-Super-Detailed-WWII-Era-Vehicles-%28Planes-Tanks-Trucks-Boats%29-With-BD-Armory-Variants), so hop on over to that if you're interested!

I look forward to working with everyone on the forum and getting to know people, so with that, have a great day!

-Rix Killian

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T19:21:23Z" title="06/09/2015 07:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by RixKillian**

Oh, hello!

Glad to see that you posted here, looks like you're becoming an active member of the forums!

Keep it up!
